items.title: Mushroom Gravy
items.excerpt: This mushroom gravy is a holiday must-have, especially if you'd rather skip the fuss of pan drippings.

items.title: Japanese Crab and Avocado Salad
items.excerpt: It can be a challenge to find winter holiday recipes that are suited to warmer climates. This luxurious Asian-inspired crab salad fills the bill with its festive colors and flavors. —Laura Wilhelm, West Hollywood, California

items.title: Is Aldi’s Diet Cola Really a Dupe for McDonald’s Diet Coke?
items.excerpt: McDonald's Diet Coke has long had a reputation for being the best, so does Aldi's Diet Cola even compete?

items.title: Crispy Party Bites
items.excerpt: These are so quick to make and are great as a bite-sized appetizer. Throughout the years, I have substituted different meats, toppings and cheese, and it's always a favorite of guests. —Kristie Schley, Pasadena, Maryland

items.title: Cheesy Bruschetta Dip
items.excerpt: This creamy, flavorful dip comes together quickly and is a real crowd-pleaser. It is a delicious complement to a meal or a fun appetizer to serve at a party. —Theresa Ravencraft, Marysville, Ohio

items.title: The Stanley Cross Bottle Is Here—And We’re Obsessed With the Dazzling Midnight Glitz Hue
items.excerpt: We're calling it: The Stanley Cross Bottle is fall's best-kept accessory secret.

items.title: Orange Snow Balls
items.excerpt: These snow balls are perfectly sweet with just a hint of tart orange flavor. Everyone loves them, and I always get recipe requests when I bring them to a party. —Brooke Wofford, Travelers Rest, South Carolina

items.title: Muffaletta Dip
items.excerpt: I love everything about a Muffaletta sandwich, so I just had to make it into a dip. It makes for a great party appetizer! —Courtney Stultz, Weir, Kansas

items.title: Guava Margaritas
items.excerpt: While visiting family, I tasted a guava margarita and fell in love with the tropical flavors. I rushed home to create my own version! —Renee Page, Rochelle, Illinois

items.title: Bacon Cheeseburger Pizza
items.excerpt: For the nights you crave a burger and a slice at the same time, bacon cheeseburger pizza is your ticket to happiness.

items.excerpt: Let us know what you think in the comments down below!

items.title: Nearly 50,000 Units Of Popular Salad Dressing Recalled For Undeclared Allergens
items.excerpt: A Class I recall has been issued for nearly 50,000 units of honey balsamic salad dressing due to the presence of undeclared allergens. The recall, initiated by the manufacturer, began after it was discovered that the affected product contained Asian Sesame Ginger dressing rath…

items.title: I Tried Trader Joe’s & Costco Pumpkin Muffins Side By Side—Here’s The Winner
items.excerpt: Pumpkin spice season is in full swing, which means you can find our favorite fall flavor in everything from lattes to cheese . One of the most common iterations is the humble pumpkin muffin. You can make a recipe from scratch or with a pre-made mix, but nearly every cafe and g…

items.title: I Tried Milk Bar's Tomato & Mayo Cake Sandwich—We NEED To Talk About It
items.excerpt: Sandwiches raised a lot of us. Lunchbox classics five days a week: PB&J on Monday, salami on Tuesday, bologna when the fridge looked bleak. As an adult, a sandwich still saves my day when ambition is low and the stove is judging me from across the room.

items.title: Apple Pancakes
items.excerpt: Picture a perfect cozy fall breakfast : Waking up without an alarm to the warming smells of cinnamon and apples wafting out of the kitchen, and finding a fresh stack of fluffy pancakes ready to be devoured. That’s enough even to get me out from under the blankets on a cool fal…

items.title: This Is The Most Popular Soup In The U.S. Right Now—And It's A Fall Classic

items.title: National Cheeseburger Day Is Here—Celebrate With These Juicy Deals
items.excerpt: Craving something cheesy? National Cheeseburger Day is September 18, and to celebrate, many of your favorite chains are serving up sizzling hot deals so you can celebrate (in some instances, all week long)—and get that cheese fix taken care of. From buy-one-get-one-free deals …
